Description: Fragment of fattened handle from a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium, orange-pink; light grey core. Rectangular stamp. Greek inscription.
Type series: KT2222 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Name, Dionysios. Trimmed. The stamp is noted by Virginia Grace in her publication of a similar stamp from the Czech excavations at Kyme, Kyme I 96-7, A6.
